thanksForShare.headline: Thanks for helping us improve. TechLooper wants to help you Move Up, Do you deserve a salary raise ?
thanksForShare.item1.headline: 1 - Read Your Salary Report
thanksForShare.item1.content: Talking TechLooper Salary Survey help you compare with people who do the same job at a similar company, have similar experience and live where the cost of living is comparable. In general if your earnings fall below the 50% you probably want to start thinking about asking for a raise.
thanksForShare.item2.headline: 2 - Strategize
thanksForShare.item2.content: Salary negotiation is always challenging, keep it professional, friendly, data driven and timely. Leverage your skills and experience to justify you salary raise request.
thanksForShare.item3.headline: 3 - Negotiate
thanksForShare.item3.content: Be ambitious but realistic yearly salary increases vary depends on industry but average stands between 2% to 5% while average promotions are between 10% to 20%
companyInfo.headline: You are one step away from getting your Salary Report, just let us know more about your current company.
